reviewText: I watched this DVD the day it arrived and then sent it to my granddaughters in Arizona; they were absolutely amazed and inspired by Nick.  They noted that at first they were shocked that he didn't have arms or legs, but within a few minutes, they were so focused on his message, that they forgot all about his deficits!

reviewText: I use this in therapy groups to inspire personal development and change despite the obstacles. The DVD is inspiring and clients walk away feeling hopeful and inspired.
summary: No Arms, No Legs, No worrries
Title: N/A

reviewText: GREAT inspirational story that everyone needs to see and hear.  Played it for my family and they loved it.  Nick is just a remarkable reminder that God has a purpose for everyone.  Disappointed that this dvd wouldn't play on our computers. . .just kept on spinning.  I wouldn't settle for a used one again-one's interpretation of "good quality" may not be the same as yours.
summary: DVD was really scratched up-wouldn't play on our computers at all-but played well on dvd player-GREAT story!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reviewText: If you ever feel sorry for yourself, watch this video !!!!! Nick has surpassed what most people would be unable to even think they could do, His presentations are funny, sincere and can only inspire anyone to make the most of what you have. Great watch.

reviewText: Don't miss watching this!  It's worth your time!  Would love to meet Nick in person!  We ALL should be so humble!

reviewText: This guy is so inspiring. For everyone who feels like they have nothing to offer see this video or read his books. It will inspire you to believe that God made you just the way you are and you are special.

reviewText: I bought this because I saw him on TBN. I wanted to know more. He issuch an inspiration. I'd like for anyone who is depressed or feeling sorry for themselves to watch it. It puts things in perspective.
summary: Nick Vujicic: No Arms, No legs, No Worries.

reviewText: No matter how bad your day is going...watching Nick & his positive attitude in dealing with his own adversity, you will find it difficult to feel sorry for yourself!!!  Nick was dealt what I perceive as the worst hand life could possibly deal & he faces it head on with one of the MOST POSITIVE attitudes I have ever seen.  He expects & accepts NO pity from others.  After a short time watching, admiration for his strengths & humor is what you take away with you!!!
Title: N/A
